project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the project are to increase proven oil reserves and the production level in PETROPERU's Laguna-Zapotal fields on the north coast of Peru and to improve the company's capability to prepare and implement petroleum development projects. These objectives would be accomplished through the provision of: (i) equipment and infrastructure as well as drilling and project management services for 159 new wells to be drilled and 76 existing wells to be reactivated in the Laguna-Zapotal fields; (ii) training for PETROPERU's staff; and (iii) consultants' services to assist PETROPERU in project supervision and to study ways of optimizing the exploitation of the Laguna-Zapotal fields and prepare production enhancement projects in adjacent areas.
